message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be perfect for you.  I'm asking $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay $8,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your offer but $8,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500 to make this work.  Let me know if that's something we can agree on.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to pay more than $8,000 for the product. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $8,250?
